summary: An Ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 262, entitled "An Ordinance granting the right to the Oregon & Transcontinental Railroad Company and the Columbia & Puget Sound Railroad Company, and to authorized said companies to construct, maintain and operate a single or double track railroad along the water front of the City of Seattle," approved March 14, 1882, as amended by Ordinance No. 484, approved October 29, 1883, as amended by Ordinance No. 3915, approved September 4, 1895, and as amended by Ordinance No. 6350, approved November 7, 1900.
